abstract: A senior executive of Koch Industries on Tuesday sent a letter to the company’s employees disputing a new book about the Kochs and other conservative families, saying it significantly exaggerated the role of the company’s founder, Fred C. Koch, in constructing an important refinery for the Nazi regime in Germany.

headline.main: Koch Executive Disputes Book’s Account of Founder’s Role in Nazi Refinery
headline.print_headline: Koch Executive Says Book Overstates Work for Nazis
